original: Åkerberg, Ragnar Odvar, verkst. direktör, Jönköping, f. 19/6/96 i Eskilstuna av kamr. Carl Å. O’. Amanda Persson. G. 1. 20 m. Agnes Björk-qvist, d. 44; 2. 46 m. Rut Dahlström. — Anst. v. Tryck. A-B Folket 12-27 s. faktor o. annonschef, ekonomichef o. verkst. dir. v. Tryck A-B Aurora 27-41, ekanomichef o. verkst. dir. i Tryck. A-B Småland sed. 41. Led. av styr. f. Tryck. A-B Småland sed. 42, av styr. f. A-B Samor§:anis. i Sthlm sed. 42, av styr. f. Smålandskrets, av Sv. tidn:-utgifören., led. av Jönköp. stads bygg-n :nd sed. 47, v. ordf. där sed. 48, led. av Ystads stadsfullm. 31-41, av Ystads drätsielkamm. 33-41, av styr. f. Ystads Saltsjöbad 30-41, av styr. f. Ystads folksk. 32-41, led. av stadsrev. i Ystad 28-33. Medarb. i tidskr. o. dagspress. Sign.: Ragnar Odvarson, R. A-g. Hobby: målning.
translated: Åkerberg, Ragnar Odvar, managing director, Jönköping, b. 19/6/96 in Eskilstuna to comrade Carl Å. O.’ and Amanda Persson. M. 1. 20 with Agnes Björkqvist, d. 44; 2. 46 with Rut Dahlström. Employed by Print A-B Folket 12-27 as a factor and advertising manager, economic manager and managing director at Print A-B Aurora 27-41, economic manager and managing director at Print A-B Småland since 41. Member of the board of directors at Print A-B Småland since 42, on the board of directors at A-B Samordnais in Stockholm since 42, on the board of directors of Smålandskrets, Swedish newspaper publishers, member of the Jönköping city building board since 47, vice chairman since 48, member of Ystad city council 31-41, member of Ystad municipal finance committee 33-41, on the board of Ystad Saltsjöbad 30-41, on the board of Ystad primary school 32-41, member of the city audit office in Ystad 28-33. Collaborator in magazines and daily press. Signature: Ragnar Odvarson, R.A-g. Hobby: painting.
